          <title>
            <string language="en">Light travels in straight lines: a pencil shadow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in gerade Geraden: ein 
Bleistiftschatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lumière voyage dans les lignes droites : 
une ombre de crayon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em linhas retas: uma sombra do 
lápis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia nelle linee rette: un'ombra
della matita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια στις ευθείες γραμμές: μια σκιά 
μολυβιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en líneas rectas: una sombra 
del lápiz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light travels in straight lines. This causes the pencil to cast a shadow on the screen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pencil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht in gerade 
Geraden reist. Dieses veranläßt den Bleistift, einen Schatten 
auf dem Bildschirm zu werfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière voyage 
dans les lignes droites. Ceci fait mouler le crayon une ombre 
sur l'écran.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz viaja em 
linhas retas. Isto faz com que o lápis molde uma sombra na 
tela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce viaggia 
nelle linee rette. Ciò induce la matita a lanciare un'ombra 
sullo schermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ελαφριά ταξίδια στις 
ευθείες γραμμές. Αυτό αναγκάζει το μολύβι για να πετάξει 
μια σκιά στην οθόνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz viaja en 
líneas rectas. Esto hace el lápiz echar una sombra en la 
pantalla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bleistift</string>
